extensionInfo.message: ANOTHERpass Extension is licensed under GPLv3. License and source code can be found here.

extensionHelp1.message: This is an browser extension to access a linked ANOTHERpass vault.

extensionHelp2.message: To use this extension you need the ANOTHERpass Android app on your mobile device. More details about this extension can be found here.

extensionHelp3.message: To get it working, you have to link the extension with your ANOTHERpass app by clicking on the link icon 🔗 displayed above :-)

vaultUnlocked.description: Lock status about the local vault

vaultLocked.description: Lock status about the local vault

localVaultLocked.description: states that the local vault is explicitly locked

lblPassword.description: A label for a password input field

lblRepeatPassword.description: A label for a repeat-password input field

hintInputPassword.message: Remember to select a hard to guess password
hintInputPassword.description: A hint as tooltip on password input fields

errorPasswordTooShort.description: Error shown if a password entered in a password field is too short

errorPasswordDiffers.description: Error shown if a password entered in a password field differs to the repeat-password field

titleConfigureLocalVaultPassword.description: Title of a dialog to configure a local vault password

messageConfigureLocalVaultPassword.message: For more convinience you can configure a local vault password to unlock the local vault without the need of using the ANOTHERpass app. You may still use the app to unlock at any time.
messageConfigureLocalVaultPassword.description: Message of a dialog to configure a local vault password

successMessageConfigureLocalVaultPasswor.description: Success-Message of a dialog after configuring a local vault password

titleRemoveLocalVaultPassword.description: Title of a dialog to remove the configured local vault password

messageRemoveLocalVaultPassword.message: You are about to delete the local vault password. That means you will only be able to unlock the local vault with the ANOTHERpass app. Continue?
messageRemoveLocalVaultPassword.description: Message of a dialog to remove the configured local vault password

successMessageRemoveLocalVaultPassword.description: Success-Message of a dialog after removing the local vault password

titleLockLocalVault.description: Title of a dialog to lock the local vault

titleUnlockLocalVault.description: Title of a dialog to unlock the local vault with a password or the app

messageUnlockLocalVault.message: Enter the password to unlock the local vault or use the ANOTHERpass app.
messageUnlockLocalVault.description: Message of a dialog to unlock the local vault with a password or the app

successMessageUnlockLocalVault.message: Extension successfully un-linked from the app! You can now remove the linked device $linkId$ from your app.
successMessageUnlockLocalVault.description: Success message of a dialog if unlocking the local vault with a password was successful

errorMessageUnlockLocalVault.message: Cannot unlock the local vault with provided password. Wrong password?
errorMessageUnlockLocalVault.description: Error message of a dialog if unlocking the local vault with a password has failed

lblUseTheApp.description: Button label to initiate the app flow to unlock the local vault

lblLinkedState.description: Label to indicate a linked extension (with the app) and the link id

lblNotLinkedState.description: Label to indicate an unlinked extension (with the app)

messageUnlinkFromApp.message: Are you sure to unlink $linkId$ from the app? This will also wipe the local vault with all local credentials.

lblUnlink.description: Label on a buton to unlink the extension

linkedVaultId.description: To what ANOTHERpass vault id the extension is linked to

tooltipFetchSingleCredential.message: Fetch single credential from the app

tooltipFetchMultipleCredentials.message: Fetch a selection of credentials from the app

tooltipFetchAllCredentials.message: Fetch all credential from the app, except veiled

tooltipDownloadBackupFile.message: Download the encrypted vault backup file from the app

tooltipSynchronizeAll.message: Synchronize all local credentials with the app

tooltipSortOrder.message: Change the sort order of the local credentials

messageDeleteAllLocalCredentials.message: Are you sure to delete all credentials from the local vault? This wont delete any credenial from the linked device.

tooltipDeleteAllLocalCredentials.message: Delete all local credentials from the local vault
